basic.description:
Critical approaches to the role of the geographic, cultural and historical imagination in shaping landscapes, environments and society.
LEARNING HOURS    127 (36L;4G;12O;3Oc;72P)
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: The Geographical Imagination

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of GPHY229 or 3.0 units in DEVS at the 200 level or above, or permission of the Department.
